enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: REASON: Pre-registration is not allowed for this class. Please try again during regular registration.

Pre-Requisite: Students must have completed CHEM 210-2 and CHEM 230-2 with a minimum of C-, or be currently enrolled in CHEM 210-2 and 230-2 to register for this course.
title: WCAS CHEM 210-3-01 Organic Chemistry
class_attributes:
Natural Sciences Distro Area

CHEM 210-3 9AM requires CHEM 230-3 9AM

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Chemistry 210-3 is a continuation of Chemistry 210-1, and 210-2 and relies heavily on the foundation provided by those courses to elaborate the structures and properties of polyfunctional compounds of biochemical and medicinal interest. Also covered are topics in molecular orbital theory, polymer chemistry, organic synthesis, bioorganic chemistry, and recent developments in organic chemistry.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: Student must earn a grade of C- or better in Chemistry 210-2 and Chemistry 230-2.

Students enrolled in this course MUST also enroll in the associated laboratory course, Chem 230-3.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Organic Chemistry, 8th Edition, by L.G. Wade, Pearson ($144.20 new)***
Turning Technologies Response Card Model QT or NXT ("Clicker") and associated license ($58.65 new; $44.00 used)***

***Prices as listed by the Northwestern Norris Bookstore (2/3/17). Course materials may be available from other vendors at lower prices.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value:
Solutions for Organic Chemistry, 8th Edition, Jan Simek, Pearson ($161.60 new; $64.65 used)***
Molecular Modeling Kit ($41.15 new; $30.85 used)***

***Prices as listed by the Northwestern Norris Bookstore (6/14/16). Course materials may be available from other vendors at lower price

subject: CHEM
